Remote Career Coach

I help professionals land flexible, location-independent careers through personalized coaching, targeted job-search strategies, and standout CV and LinkedIn optimization. Whether you're transitioning to your first remote role or leveling up in your remote career, I provide the guidance, tools, and support you need to confidently take the next step—no matter where you are in the world.
